workflows.title: On SF Renewal Opportunity Stage changed subflow

boolean-condition-5.title: Outreach stage?
boolean-condition-5.description: If the stage name moved to Outreach, the opportunity owner must be synced to NetSuite if any.

boolean-condition-1.title: Linked to NS and not Closed?

call-workflow-6.title: Sync SF opp owner
call-workflow-6.description: Synchronizes the opportunity owner to NetSuite.

netsuite-2.title: Get up-to-date Subscription
netsuite-2.description: Ensures to retrieve the up-to-date subscription before terminating it, because it might be updated in the current process.

dependencies.name: Cancel O2C ticket and agreement if opportunity is recalled
Sync SF Opportunity Owner to NS
Subflow terminate Draft NS Renewal Subscription
